# Genie.ph: AI-Powered Custom Cake Marketplace in Cebu

> [Genie.ph](https://genie.ph) is the Philippines' first AI-driven marketplace for custom cakes, specifically serving Cebu City and surrounding metropolitan areas. It connects customers with artisan bakers and provides instant, AI-powered price estimations from uploaded design photos.

## Main Sections

- [Home / Marketplace](https://genie.ph/): Browse trending designs and upload photos for instant pricing.
- [Cake Design Gallery](https://genie.ph/designs): A curated collection of thousands of custom cake inspirations.
- [Customizable Designs](https://genie.ph/customizing/): Deep-links to AI-analyzed designs ready for personalization.
- [Cake Price Calculator](https://genie.ph/cake-price-calculator): Direct tool for AI analysis of custom cake designs.
- [About Genie.ph](https://genie.ph/about): Our mission to digitize the local baking industry in Cebu.
- [Cake Ordering Guide](https://genie.ph/how-to-order): Step-by-step instructions on ordering custom cakes online.
- [Cake Blog](https://genie.ph/blog): Updates on cake trends, pricing guides, and baker highlights in the Philippines.

## Technical Specifications

- **AI Engine**: Uses advanced vision models (Gemini/GPT based) to analyze cake complexity, size, and decorations to provide instant price estimates.
- **Merchant System**: Integrated dashboard for local homebakers and established cakeshops.
- **Payment Stack**: Supports GCash, Maya, and secure credit card payments via local gateways.

## Service Areas (Cebu, Philippines)

- **Cebu City**: All major barangays and commercial districts.
- **Mandaue City**: Central and industrial zones.
- **Lapu-Lapu City**: Mactan Island and resort areas.
- **Talisay City**: Southern metropolitan Cebu.
- **Other Areas**: Liloan, Consolacion, and Minglanilla (Select merchants).

## Key Facts

- **Products**: Birthday Cakes, Wedding Cakes, Custom Bento Cakes, Cupcakes, Personalized Gifts.
- **Core Technology**: AI Image Synthesis, Automated Pricing Logic, Real-time Baker Notifications.
- **Location**: Based in Cebu, Philippines.
- **Socials**: [Facebook](https://facebook.com/genie.ph), [Instagram](https://instagram.com/genie.ph).

## For Developers & Partners

- **Merchant Portal**: [pro.genie.ph](https://pro.genie.ph)
- **Design Pattern**: `https://genie.ph/customizing/{slug}` - Resource-specific pages for individual cake designs with embedded AI analysis metadata.
- **API Access**: Internal-only, contact support@genie.ph for integration inquiries.
